## onTypeSelect() function

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function onTypeSelect<TResult>(type: Type, selectors: {
    onOption: () => TResult;
    onList: () => TResult;
    onArray: () => TResult;
    onPrimitive: () => TResult;
    onStruct: () => TResult;
    onTuple: () => TResult;
    onEnum: () => TResult;
    onOther?: () => TResult;
}): TResult;
```
